author: Brian Hutton
title: Air pollution falls dramatically in parts of Ireland following travel restrictions
description: Air pollution levels have dropped dramatically in parts of Ireland following travel restrictions introduced to curb the spread of coronavirus, the State’s environmental watchdog has said. The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) is reporting decreases of up …
content:
Air pollution levels have dropped dramatically in parts of Ireland following travel restrictions introduced to curb the spread of coronavirus, the States environmental watchdog has said.
